definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Diagnosis of acute infection is often missed because the infected person has no symtoms.
sentences.chinese: 由于被感染者无症状，对急性感染经常无法及时确诊。

sentences.english: As for AIDS-infected persons where arrested in fact, the answer is simple.
sentences.chinese: 至于艾滋病感染者抓了关在哪里，其实答案也很简单。

sentences.english: Intensive supportive care with treatment of symptoms is the main approach to managing the infection in people.
sentences.chinese: 强化支持性护理并治疗症状是管理感染者的主要方法。

sentences.english: Eventually the virus prevails and the infected person succumbs to the infection.
sentences.chinese: 最终病毒体会战胜药物，而导致感染者死亡。

sentences.english: AIDS is triggered by a virus acquired through direct contact with infected body fluids.
sentences.chinese: 通过与被感染者体液的直接接触就会引发艾滋病。

sentences.english: Dracunculiasis is rarely fatal but infected people become non-functional for months.
sentences.chinese: 麦地那龙线虫病极少致命，但是感染者数月不能工作。

sentences.english: About 20% of people who become infected with WNV will develop West Nile fever.
sentences.chinese: 西尼罗河病毒感染者中，约20%会发展为西尼罗热。

sentences.english: If the mother is positive, that mother needs to take an in dividual decision.
sentences.chinese: 如果母亲是艾滋病病毒感染者，她需要自己做出决定。

sentences.english: Tuberculosis is harder to diagnose in HIV-positive people than in those who are uninfected.
sentences.chinese: 与未感染者相比，HIV阳性患者确诊结核病更困难。

sentences.english: And Dr Flegr has found other abnormalities in infected people.
sentences.chinese: 弗莱格博士还发现了感染者的其他异常。

sentences.english: Bacteria present in the faeces of an infected person are the main source of contamination.
sentences.chinese: 存在于受感染者粪便中的杆菌是主要污染源。

sentences.english: The virus spreads through the air when an infected person expels air suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 当感染者急促地排出气体时病毒通过空气传播。

sentences.english: Worldwide, HAV infections account for an estimated 1.4 million cases annually.
sentences.chinese: 据估计，每年世界各地甲型肝炎感染者有140万例。

sentences.english: You can get an STD by having unprotected sex with a partner who's infected.
sentences.chinese: 可以通过与感染者的无防护性行为而感染性病。

sentences.english: It also has the ability to walk through the polymorphic code of modern file infectors.
sentences.chinese: 它也有能力走过现代文件的感染者多态代码。

sentences.english: The United States are about 1.1 million living with HIV.
sentences.chinese: 美国现有大约110万生存的艾滋病感染者。

definition: human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
HIV/see also 愛滋病毒|爱滋病毒[ai4 zi1 bing4 du2]
AIDS (loanword)/see also 愛滋病|爱滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
rate of infection (usu. of a disease)
person suffering (from a disease or poisoning)/a patient
